resources.string: Baykus35 is a tiny app that shows night bus timetable information and bus stop locations with respect to accurate information provided by ESHOT General Directorate / Izmir.Timetable information can also be reached using ESHOT official website, www.eshot.gov.tr.
*Bus stops shown on the map are located due to their approximate locations.
*Distance information is calculated considering user\'s air distance to that bus stop.
For your any proposals and suggestions even your complains please do not hesitate to get in touch. You can contact using baykusotuzbes@gmail.com email address.
You need active internet connection to locate bus stops on the map correctly.
Your approximate distance to this bus stop is %.2f meters.
Your approximate distance to this bus stop is %.2f kilometres.
Take me to this bus stop!
Please click to start navigation to this bus stop.
GPS is disabled in your device. Would you like to enable it?
Goto Settings Page To Enable GPS
